item.title: MIUI V13.0.9.0.SLNCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K50 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K50 China

Codename: rubens

Version: V13.0.9.0.SLNCNXM | 12.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: 81d50c34ce1fd78e58dd228b8ae80ad2

Changelog:
[Other improvements and optimizations]
New: 120 Hz DC dimming
Optimization: Picture quality for Genshin
Optimization: Usability
Optimization: Improved system stability
Fix: Wi-Fi connection issues
Fix: Display irregularities occurred during video playback
Fix: Prompts about the system not responding appeared in some cases
Fix: Home screen animations took too long to load in some cases
Fix: Health Kit scanner didn't work properly in some cases

Download: Here
